revised_title: Observations on Hermetically-Sealed Flasks and Light's Influence on Bacteria
tldr: Professor Tyndall shares his observations on hermetically-sealed flasks containing infusions opened on the Alps, confirming Pasteur's experiments on the Mer de G-lace. Additionally, Arthur Downs and T. P. Blunt investigate the effect of light on bacterial growth and other organisms, finding that light influences the development of bacteria in certain solutions.
